Trade/Device Name(s): eSensor® Cystic Fibrosis Carrier Detection System
eSensor® Cystic Fibrosis Carrier Detection Kit
Regulation Name(s): CFTR (cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator) gene mutation detection system
Analyte(s): CFTR gene mutations (24 panel mutations as recommended by ACMG/ACOG)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for eSensor Cystic Fibrosis Carrier Detection System for genotyping CFTR mutations from blood using multiplex PCR and electrochemical detection
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative assay to detect cystic fibrosis carrier status in adult couples contemplating pregnancy by identifying ACMG/ACOG-recommended CFTR gene mutations from blood; not for prenatal screening or diagnosis, for professional use only in CLIA-certified laboratories.
